name: Soy Chocolate Collagen
description: Indulge in a healthy treat with our Soy Chocolate Collagen recipe. Perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet, this delightful beverage combines the richness of double Belgian chocolate with the nutty flavor of pistachio milk and the health benefits of vital proteins. A must-try for anyone looking to enjoy a delicious, guilt-free refreshment.
recipeIngredient: 20 g Vital proteins â€“ two scoops
45 ml Double Belgian Chocolate with Pistachio Milk

recipeInstructions.text: Measure 0.25 cup of Double Belgian Chocolate.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Measure 45 ml of Double Belgian Chocolate mixed with Pistachio Milk.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Measure 20 grams of Vital Proteins, equal to two scoops.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the Double Belgian Chocolate with the Pistachio Milk until well combined, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vital proteins to the mixture and continue blending until smooth and creamy, about 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the Soy Chocolate Collagen beverage in a tall glass and enjoy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
